abstract: Mack Breed, assistant football coach at John Jay High School in San Antonio, admits to having told players Michael Moreno and Victor Rojas to hit referee Robert Watts; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mack Breed, a high school assistant coach in San Antonio, acknowledged that he directed two of his players to hit a referee during a game this month, the school’s principal said.

headline.main: Coach Admits to Instructing Players to Hit Referee
headline.print_headline: Coach Admits to Instructing Players to Hit Referee

snippet: Mack Breed, a high school assistant coach in San Antonio, acknowledged that he directed two of his players to hit a referee during a game this month, the school’s principal said.
